label: 楝
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: Possibly purple lined with a lighter shade of the same colour.  Ōchi is the old name for the Japanese bead tree (sendan, Melia azedarach, var. subtripinnata), which reaches about eight metres in height and in spring bears light purple, five-petaled flowers.[楝,栴檀][also 樗][RK]
